thread.title: JLR to launch updated ‘Range Rover Evoque’ in India next month
thread.title_full: JLR to launch updated ‘Range Rover Evoque’ in India next month | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: JLR to launch updated ‘Range Rover Evoque’ in India next month
text:
Other Articles Audi S5 Sportback launched in India; priced at Rs 62.95 lakh Chevrolet Trailblazer set to launch Wednesday in India: 5 Things you should know New Bajaj Avenger might launch on October 27, 2015 Tata Motors-owned Jaguar Land Rover today said it will launch the updated version of its luxury sports utility vehicle ‘Range Rover Evoque’ in India next month and has started taking the bookings.
The 2016 Range Rover Evoque will be launched in the domestic market in November and Land Rover retailers are now formally accepting bookings, JLR said in a statement.
“Over the years, the response to the Range Rover Evoque has been phenomenal across the world and India has been no exception,” JLR India President Rohit Suri said.
With its striking lines, muscular shoulder and tapered roof, the 2016 Range Rover Evoque sets itself apart from its contemporaries, he added.
“The fabulous design, coupled with class-leading technology and luxury features make the 2016 Range Rover Evoque an unbeatable choice,” Suri said.
Land Rover range in the country includes the flagship Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Discovery 4, which come as completely built up units (CBU), and locally manufactured Discovery Sport.
The models are priced between Rs 46.1 lakh and Rs 2.07 crore (ex-Mumbai pre octroi).
 20, 2015 4:00 pm
